message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this generous offer and we can both walk away happy.
Alice, let's be realistic. My turn now.  I'm feeling generous, but this deal won't last forever.
Bob, time is running out! I'm offering you a fair deal. Let's not be greedy.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Meet me in the middle or the deal is off.
Bob, this is my final offer. Take it or leave it. The clock is ticking!
Alice, this is my last offer. Take it or we both lose. Don't let time run out on us both.
